lead_paragraph: Materials and energy companies rose as the price of gold and silver and oil increased. Drug company stocks continued to tumble.

headline.print_headline: A Surge Nudges the Dow Into Positive Territory for the Year
headline.main: Surge Nudges Dow Back Into Positive Territory

snippet: Materials and energy companies rose as the price of gold and silver and oil increased. Drug company stocks continued to tumble.
abstract: Stock prices surge, turning Dow Jones industrial average positive for year.
